name: Chevreuse
source: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the Skill finalizes:</color> If your Hand has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113131]</color>: $[K56] 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the Skill finalizes:</color> If your Hand has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Overcharged Ball</color>: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.
skills.description:
Deals 2 Pyro DMG.
After the Skill finalizes: If your Hand has Overcharged Ball: Discard 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.

skills.name: Ring of Bursting Grenades
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113132]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Secondary Explosive Shells</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.description: Deals 2 Pyro DMG, creates 1 Secondary Explosive Shells on the opponent's side of the field.

skills.name: Vertical Force Coordination
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113131]</color> card in your Hand (Once per Round)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Overcharged Ball</color> card in your Hand (Once per Round)
skills.description: (Passive) After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG: Create 1 Overcharged Ball card in your Hand (Once per Round)
